text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/who-smart-hiv-dak/CodeSystem/concept-codes
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    HIV.D.DE392Routine viral load testReason for HIV viral load test - Routine viral load test
    HIV.D.DE393Targeted viral load monitoringReason for HIV viral load test - Targeted viral load monitoring
    HIV.D.DE394Initial viral load testReason for HIV viral load test - Initial viral load test
    HIV.D.DE395Follow-up viral load test after receiving enhanced adherence counsellingReason for HIV viral load test - Follow-up viral load test after receiving enhanced adherence counselling

name: ReasonforHIVviralloadtestCodes
title: Reason for HIV viral load test Codes
description: Codes representing possible values for the Reason for HIV viral load test element

concept.display: Follow-up viral load test after receiving enhanced adherence counselling
